display_long_description:
**🕺 Dance to the rhythm of your own songs! 🕺**

Make fun poses, dodge obstacles and punch walls to beat each level. Do you want to make high scores and enter in the competitive arena? We got you covered. Do you want to be silly and just have fun with friends? Try the Party Mode!

[media]

Do you want more content? Then you can create infinite maps with our free level editor! Download it for PC and enjoy creating your own choreagraphies to the rhythm of your songs with an easy and intuitive interface!

On top of all the fun and movement that characterizes OhShape, you can have an intense workout withouth even realizing! We have raised the stakes with the free Power Up Update, an action packed album with 6 new sessions and 2 difficulty levels designed to make you sweat and engage every part of your body!
´
[media]

# Key Features


🕺Fun poses and catchy music to keep you moving

🥽 Good for VR rhythm newcomers and seasoned players

💪 Fun and great workout for your whole body

⛰️ More than 40 stages with 4 difficulty levels

🏅Online leaderboards

📝 Level editor to create your maps with your own music

**Join our Discord Channel for more content!**
https://discord.com/invite/oddersgames
